channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This shipbuilder’s stock is soaring to a fresh record as company wins contract to produce a new type of Navy frigate
item.description: Shares of military shipbuilder Huntington Ingalls Industries were up sharply Monday, building on Friday’s surge that came after the U.S. Navy announce...

item.title: My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: Sorry, winning Powerball’s $1.6 billion jackpot won’t make you a billionaire. Here’s why you may end up with $120,412,700.
item.description: Various factors can reduce a lottery prize, from taxes to even the cost of a limo ride.

item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
item.description: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

item.title: How to prepare your portfolio for shocks and growth opportunities in 2026, according to UBS
item.description: Celebrate your 2025 winnings and then gear your portfolio for the new year.

item.title: The charts show a possible breakout in this insurance stock, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts on this insurer heading into 2026.

item.title: NYSE insider Jay Woods on the 'Magnificent Seven' stock that's breaking out into year-end
item.description: Jay Woods, chief market strategist at Freedom Capital Markets, will continue to keep an eye on Tesla.

item.title: Starbucks turnaround will take time. This options strategy works if shares remain range-bound
item.description: Starbucks has taken steps to stabilize its business, but shares could trade in a tight range over the next several months.

item.title: A look at two industrial names on our Best Stocks list, including one that's a buy right now
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo take readers through these two industrial giants.
